title.native: 転生賢者の異世界ライフ ～第二の職業を得て、世界最強になりました～
title.romaji: Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life: Daini no Shokugyo wo Ete, Sekai Saikyou ni Narimashita
title.english: My Isekai Life: I Gained a Second Character Class and Became the Strongest Sage in the World!

description:
Getting isekai’d to a magical world and developing incredible powers is every otaku’s wildest dream, but for salaryman Yuuji Sano, it’s the stuff of absolute nightmare! He’s in the middle of a mountain of work when he gets unwillingly pulled into a fantasy realm, where he accomplishes the enviable feat of developing a second character class by making the most of his Monster Tamer abilities. Now he’s traded the office for adventuring to make a living, but he keeps getting roped into major events because his powers are unmatched, second to none — and he doesn't even realize it yet!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonyms: เกิดใหม่ในต่างโลกเป็นปราชญ์แกร่งสุดโดยไม่รู้ตัว

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Necromancy
tags.description: When the dead are summoned as spirits, skeletons, or the undead, usually for the purpose of gaining information or to be used as a weapon.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

node.description:
**Height:** 152 cm

On October 17, 2023, she announced her marriage with music producer [Yunomi](https://anilist.co/staff/155750/Yunomi) via [Twitter.](https://twitter.com/nichika1015/status/1714101695633055776)

[Agency (Across Ent)](https://across-ent.com/talent/women/nichika_omori.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nichika1015) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nichika_omori) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3St-FyRoAvdgqeJA2EiKjw)

[Agency Profile](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/tono_hikaru/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hikaru_tono) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hikaru_tono/) 

Non-anime roles:
Tribbie - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
Yasunori Gotou is an episode director.
